description: Connect to and query a MySQL database and convert the result to a datatable; SELECT statements only.

input.name: connection string
input.description: The connection string to connect to the database, e.g. `DSN=MYDSN`

input.name: connection timeout
input.description:
The number of seconds to wait for a request on the connection to complete before returning to the application.
Defaults to 30.

input.name: login timeout
input.description:
The number of seconds to wait for a login request to complete before returning to the application.
Defaults to 30.

input.name: query timeout
input.description:
The number of seconds that the query will attempt to execute before returning to the application.
Defaults to 30.

input.name: parameters
input.description: A list of values to bind to the parameter markers, if there are any. The number of values in this array must match the number of parameter markers in the sql statement.

output.name: data
output.description: An object containing columns and rows.
